titles.title: New River Gorge National Park and Preserve Designation Act
New River Gorge National Park and Preserve Designation Act
A bill to designate the New River Gorge National River in the State of West Virginia as the "New River Gorge National Park and Preserve", and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.
Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Hearings held in Beckley, West Virginia. With printed Hearing: S.Hrg. 116-363.

bill.summary:
New River Gorge National Park and Preserve Designation Act
This bill redesignates the New River Gorge National River in West Virginia as the "New River Gorge National Park and Preserve."
